page.title: 19A Farmhouse Kitchen.
page.content:
We visited{White House Farm.}All around the farm was a moat.We went up the drive past lots of flowers.
The door was big with two panels in it and a lion-shaped knocker.The door was opened by the farmer's wife and she told us to go round to the kitchen.
In the kitchen there was a range, a table and two dogs.There was an old clock in the corner and there was some old china.Around the table there were big ,old chairs.There were stone pitchers and coats-of-arms on the walls.The floor was made of stone.
